definition: to chop wood/to chop down trees
to chop/to cut down/to throw sth at sb

sentences.english: They cut wood and hard fruits with stone axes.
sentences.chinese: 他们用石斧砍树和坚硬的果子。

sentences.english: I have a good axe which is used to cut trees.
sentences.chinese: 我有一把可用来砍树的好斧头。

sentences.english: She ran out in her pyjamas to tell men who were cutting trees nearby.
sentences.chinese: 穿着睡衣的她，跑到外面告诉正在附近砍树的人们。

sentences.english: Urbanization decreases the likelihood of trees being felled for heating and building.
sentences.chinese: 城市化减少了砍树去热和建房的可能性。

sentences.english: When I began chopping again, my axe slipped and cut off my right leg.
sentences.chinese: 当我开始再砍树时，斧头又滑过去，砍掉了我的右腿。

sentences.english: The people never knew that cutting down the trees would cause an ecological problem.
sentences.chinese: 人们当初想不到砍树会引起生态问题。

sentences.english: When cut for firewood, they will sprout new growth from the remaining stump.
sentences.chinese: 若砍树作柴，则砍后的树桩还会生出新芽来。

sentences.english: The woodcutter laid his axe to the tree.
If the dinosaurs came back. They could help lumberjacks chop down trees.
sentences.chinese: 如果恐龙回来了，它们可以帮助伐木工砍树。

sentences.english: We cut it ourselves. It's always fun to go out and get a tree.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们自己砍的，到郊外去砍树真有趣。

sentences.english: Digging trenches and felling trees to make breaks were second nature to him.
sentences.chinese: 掘沟砍树的逃生技能也必须牢牢掌握。

sentences.english: Tree-felling is the intention of threatening to force many fruit trees.
sentences.chinese: 砍树的本意是用威胁的手段迫使果树多结果实。

sentences.english: If humanity is not quite the tree felling, the consequences will be very serious.
sentences.chinese: 如果人类不挺的砍树，后果会很严重。

sentences.english: The woodcutters kept on cutting the trees down when I went to the forest.
sentences.chinese: 我到达森林的时候，伐木工人在连续不断地砍树。

sentences.english: The third private revved his 20 HP chainsaw and started to cut.
sentences.chinese: 第三个士兵把他的20马力链锯加速，开始砍树。

sentences.english: One major contributor to desertification is people cutting down trees to burn as fuel.
sentences.chinese: 促进沙漠化的主要因素之一是人们砍树用作燃料。

definition: a saw/to cut with a saw
moso bamboo (Phyllostachys edulis), used as timber etc
to mow grass/haymaking/to write a rough draft (of an essay etc)
